ovdesc.p: This table is to store the Originating/Sender’s Reference of all “ACCEPTED” batch messages.

desc.p: Unique ID generated by the payments hub in order to identify each record in the application.
Denotes the unique ID generated by the payments hub upon receiving a message from an external system.
This field can hold upto 128 alphanumeric characters generated by the system
Holds the timestamp at which a message is received from any of the channels in the payments hub.
